sentence.Network_en: The soldiers slain in the battle were burried that night.
sentence.Network_cn: 在那天夜晚埋葬了在战斗中牺牲了的战士.

sentence.Network_en: They were finally subdued and burried alive under Mount Aetna.
sentence.Network_cn: 后来他们都被打败了并被活埋在埃特纳山下.

sentence.Network_en: Many people were dug out after being burried by the landslide.
sentence.Network_cn: 有许多埋在土里的人被挖出来.
